info.name: Pike Pier
info.attribution:
Game layout, library image, and scripting by Robin Harn, released to the Public Domain under CC0.

The following image are available under the Freepik license:

* Blob shapes by juicy_fish on Freepik: https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/set-black-blobs_43472408.htm

info.description: Claim the most lucrative food stand locations at the world famous public market center. Attract wealthy customers to your stands, and backstab your rival street vendors along the way!
info.similarAwards:
2008 Boardgames Australia Awards Best International Game Nominee
2007 Vuoden Peli Adult Game of the Year Nominee
2007 Kinderspielexperten "8-to-13-year-olds" Nominee
2007 Ã…rets Spel Best Family Game Winner

fields.text: By default, you will play the base game with a customer queue, but you may select different options below.

clickRoutine.note: Get player count 1/3 - select player seats
Get player count 2/3 - filter out empty seats
Get player count 3/3 - count remaining seats
Deal players their hands for the new round

loopRoutine.note: This was added by the automatic file migration because the behavior of MOVE with count=0 changed.

clickRoutine.note: Select all relevant holders into a collection
Loop the collection and for each holder, move the top card of the deck to that holder
Sort deck by value, highest first, so the x3's appear at the bottom of the queue in the next function
Select all relevant holders into a collection
Loop the collection and for each holder, move the top card of the deck to that holder
Set all player starting scores to be 10

objects.note: this is the card back face

objects.notes: to get back the fish icons, set type and value to image

clickRoutine.header: Add this many points to your score:

clickRoutine.note: Sanity check / typo avoidance 1 of 2: only add value if it is an integer

thenRoutine.note: Sanity check / typo avoidance 2 of 2: only add value if it is a three-digit number
